extendedInfo.description: Launching JABBERING MONKEYS from a palm tree has never been this fun... and harmless!Use your catapulting skills to become the KING OF THE JUNGLE, but watch out for dirty mud pools and ouchy rocks, or you might end up as the troop's back scratcher or tree shaker.This is JUNGLE CATAPULTING at its best!* * * * * * * * * * * *GAME FEATURES:- 60 Jungle landscapes to explore- 3 Game Modes:- (1) Challenges- (2) Arcade Mode- (3) Lite Mode- Extremely simple controls- Lots of ACHIEVEMENTS to unlock- Donut Games' famous 3-star ranking system: Increased REPLAY VALUE- Collectors Icon #03- And much more...CHALLENGES include:- Cloudy Day- Elephant Towers- Rocky Road- Bad Fruit Day- Monkey Swamp- ..and many more!* * * * * * * * * * * *"Flexible palm trees, flying monkeys, calypso music and baby elephants. What more could you possibly ask for?"Enjoy another Donut Games release!

reviews.title: Wow Finally on Android
reviews.comment: I wrote an email to u guys ages ago requesting this since i dumped my iphone, thanks alot. Game runs Beautifully on my Galaxy S2 & on my Acer tablet 9/10 . Needs Global Hiscores. CHEERS
reviews.author: Jose Ruiz

reviews.title: Good one
reviews.comment: Only 3 cause some problems.the game buttons like Quit,Play,Back buttons does not work properly in my phone.otherwise it is a deadly combination of angry bird and marrio.great idea.please fix some bugs in the next updated.Great work one second.
reviews.author: Arindam Mandal

reviews.title: Nice game - non achievable levels.
reviews.comment: Would be great if it dint have such high scores to achieve 3 stars.. they are just not achievable. Tried so much. Won all challenges except 50 games three star.. trying and trying.. least have hints guys..
reviews.author: Kanu Subramanian

reviews.title: Very pixelated game and ads sucks
reviews.comment: I played this iphone n it was amazing. This one for android not at all good. Poor graphics that is pixelated in s2 skyrocket. 1/4th of the screen is ad filled that I cant see the items at the top. Waste of download imo.
